title: Lanluma® Buttock Augmentation
description: Poly-L-lactic acid biostimulant injections that sculpt hip dips, add projection, and smooth cellulite without implants.
longDescription: Lanluma® uses poly-L-lactic acid (PLLA) to stimulate collagen deep within the buttocks and hips. Over the following weeks your body builds new support fibers, creating a fuller, lifted silhouette that looks and feels natural. We combine ultrasound mapping, cannula placement, and staged sessions to achieve bespoke curves with minimal downtime.

seo.metaTitle: Lanluma Buttock Augmentation London | Non-Surgical BBL | Dr. SNA Clinic
seo.metaDescription: Sculpt hip dips and lift your buttocks with Lanluma collagen injections. Doctor-led mapping, zero implants, results that last 2+ years.

hero.headline: Sculpted Curves, Zero Implants
hero.subheadline: Lanluma collagen stimulators create natural projection and smooth texture over 8 weeks.

overview.title: How Lanluma Works
overview.content: After numbing, Lanluma is injected via micro-cannulas into the subdermal plane. PLLA particles kick-start collagen production, gradually adding lift and smoothing dimples. We tailor placement for hip dips, upper pole fullness, or lower pole projection.

items.title: Natural Feel & Movement
items.description: No implant edges—your own tissue does the lifting.

items.title: Cellulite Smoothing
items.description: Collagen rebuild softens dimples and ripples.

items.title: Minimal Downtime
items.description: Back to light activity next day with simple massage.

packages.name: Full Projection Plan
packages.description: Two sessions for full buttock lift.

steps.title: Consult & Mapping
steps.description: Discuss goals, mark treatment zones, take baseline photos.

steps.title: Massage & Review
steps.description: At-home massage plus in-clinic review at 8 weeks.

faq.question: How many sessions do I need?
faq.answer: Most clients need 1-2 sessions depending on volume goals. We confirm at consultation.

faq.question: Can I sit afterwards?
faq.answer: Yes. Avoid intense workouts for 48 hours and follow the massage plan for best results.

faq.question: Is Lanluma safe?
faq.answer: Lanluma is CE-marked. We only inject in safe planes with cannulas and ultrasound guidance when needed.

cta.title: Design Your Dream Curves
cta.subtitle: Book a confidential Lanluma consultation with Dr. Abbas.
